cards.title: Putin says western troops in Ukraine would be ‘legitimate targets’ as European c…
cards.summary: Putin says western troops in Ukraine would be 'legitimate targets' as he repeats offer to host talks in Moscow. Ukraine’s president Volodymyr Zelenskyy has called for the European planning on security guarantees for Ukraine to accelerate. EU leaders have suggested the bloc was planning to step up its work on the next round of sanctions against Russia.

cards.title: Teen killed and seven injured in mass stabbing in Canada
cards.summary: 18-year-old woman killed and seven others injured in mass stabbing in Canada. The suspect also died in the attack at a First Nations community in Manitoba. Police said the suspect was fleeing the scene when he died in a vehicle collision.

cards.title: Google fined €2.95bn by EU for abusing advertising dominance
cards.summary: Google fined €2.95bn by EU for abusing advertising dominance. Comes amid increased scrutiny by regulators worldwide over the tech giant's empire in online search and advertising. Google told the BBC the Commission's decision was "wrong" and it would appeal.
